dict.acceptation: [法]确认，批准；证实；使有效；使巩固；

sent.orig: If schoolmate worries to confirm own registration number, please 6-48 hours later confirm own registration number.
sent.trans: 如果同学着急确认自己的注册号的话，请在6-48小时之后重新确认自己的注册号。

sent.orig: Reservation handle, Confirm, Not Confirm, Arrived at Bar, NYA, Cancel, Not Show status.
sent.trans: 预订系统提供不同的预订状态，确定，不确定，到达，已结帐，在位，等待，不明确到达，取消，应到未到等状态。

sent.orig: If you fail to confirm proof confirm, that is likely to delay the delivery date.
sent.trans: 如果轮到你确认样张的时候没有及时确认，那就很可能会延误送货日期。

sent.orig: Order confirmation. Contacting suppliers to confirm the reception of orders and confirm price and delivery date.
sent.trans: 负责订单确认。确认所有的供应商收到了来自总部的订单并确认订单的价格和交货期。

sent.orig: We confirm our acceptance of your offer of 2000 kilos of black tea.
sent.trans: 我方确认接受你方2000千克红茶的护报盘。
